titleStmt.title: Seek and you shall find; or, Certaine queryes of highest import. Most humbly tendered to be considered as no little conducing to the laying a foundation of a more rigrteous [sic] government and true Christian Common-Wealth.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the year, of care and fear. [i.e. 1659]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
